entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
